Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-289, see notes under ยง 8-2201.

DC CODE ยง 8-2211

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

The Mayor may bring an action in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to enjoin the violation or threatened violation of any provision of this chapter or of any rules promulgated under this chapter.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
